id.docs:
**, [ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: Manually specify the ID for this [Seeed Studio MR60BHA2 60GHz mmWave Breathing and Heartbeat Detection Sensor Kit component if you need multiple components.

*See also: [seeed_mr60bha2 Component/Hub](https://esphome.io/components/seeed_mr60bha2.html#configuration-variables)*

uart_id.docs:
**, [ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: Manually specify the ID of the [UART Component](https://esphome.io/components/uart.html#uart) if you want to use multiple UART buses.

*See also: [seeed_mr60bha2 Component/Hub](https://esphome.io/components/seeed_mr60bha2.html#configuration-variables)*

has_target.docs:
If true when target (person) is detected. All options from [Binary Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/binary_sensor/index.html#config-binary-sensor).

*See also: [seeed_mr60bha2 Binary Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/seeed_mr60bha2.html#id1)*

breath_rate.docs:
**, float**: Radar-detected respiratory rate during the first 60 seconds. All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).

*See also: [seeed_mr60bha2 Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/seeed_mr60bha2.html#id2)*

distance.docs:
**, float**: Straight-line distance between the radar and the monitoring object. All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).

*See also: [seeed_mr60bha2 Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/seeed_mr60bha2.html#id2)*

heart_rate.docs:
**, float**: Heart rate during the first 60 seconds as detected by the radar. All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).

*See also: [seeed_mr60bha2 Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/seeed_mr60bha2.html#id2)*

num_targets.docs:
**, int**: The number of target detected by the radar. All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).

*See also: [seeed_mr60bha2 Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/seeed_mr60bha2.html#id2)*
